app_component_t.introduction: This file is giving us a demo of using react-i18next for multiple language.

class_component.translation_render_props: Class Component achieves the function of multilingual switching through the render prop of Translation.

hoc_component.hoc_title: This is a class component too.
hoc_component.translation_render_props: If it is Class components, you can also use the higher-order component withTranslation to get the corresponding language content.
